cards.title: Respect Receipt
cards.inside: Just logging this officially: you’re a real one. Appreciate you.

cards.title: Solid Human Alert
cards.inside: Not everyone shows up like you do. That’s rare. Respect.

cards.title: No Notes
cards.inside: You handled that perfectly. I’m impressed and I’m stealing your calm.

cards.title: Hype Token
cards.inside: Cash it in whenever you need it. You’ve earned it.

cards.title: Thank You (No Essay)
cards.inside: Thanks for having my back. That’s it. That’s the message.

cards.title: Legend Behavior
cards.inside: You made it look easy. I noticed. Respect.

cards.title: Quiet Support
cards.inside: I’m in your corner. Always. No big speech.

cards.title: Victory Lap
cards.inside: That’s a win. Take a lap and enjoy it—you earned it.

cards.title: Keep Going
cards.inside: You’re closer than you think. Keep moving. I’m rooting for you.

cards.title: The Check-In
cards.inside: No pressure to perform. Just checking on my guy. I’m here.

cards.title: Peak Reliability
cards.inside: When it matters, you show up. That’s rare. I appreciate it.

cards.title: Good Call
cards.inside: You made the right call. Solid judgment.

cards.title: New Era
cards.inside: Different season. Same crew. Bigger wins.

cards.title: Energy Match
cards.inside: I see you. I respect the grind. Let’s keep it pushing.

cards.title: Bro Science
cards.inside: You’re built different. Results may vary for others.

cards.title: Accountability Ping
cards.inside: You said you’d do the thing. Go do the thing. I believe in you.

cards.title: Low Battery?
cards.inside: Rest. Reset. Then we run it back. You don’t have to carry it alone.

cards.title: Strong Quiet
cards.inside: You’ve been handling a lot without talking about it. Respect.

cards.title: The Invite
cards.inside: Food / game / walk / whatever. No agenda. Just homie time.

cards.title: Big Thanks
cards.inside: For real. For the advice, the time, the patience—thank you.

cards.title: No Cap
cards.inside: You’ve helped me more than you know. Respect forever.

cards.title: Keep It Simple
cards.inside: That’s it. That’s the whole card.

cards.title: The Compliment
cards.inside: Your character is solid. That matters more than anything.

cards.title: Ride or Ride
cards.inside: Whatever it is, we'll handle it. You're not alone.
